A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without giving away any spoiler\, this movie has lots of pointless side stories and useless scenes. Very different approach from where TFA left off. If you get all the relevant scenes that actually add anything to the plot the film would probably have around 40 minutes. They even managed to make General Organa irrelevant (like Phasma\, Finn\, Hux\, Snoke... and Poe is a trigger happy jerk).
